sentences.en: Church Street is continual with High Street.
Continual dropping wears away the stone.
Despite continual pain, he refused all drugs.
sentences.cn: 尽管一直觉得疼，他还是拒绝使用任何药物。
持续了五个星期的降雨

sentences.en: His affections were kept under continual restraint.
sentences.cn: 他的感情一直受到压抑.

sentences.en: However, for one in six people insomnia is a continual problem.
sentences.cn: 不过在每6个人中便有一人患有持续性失眠症.

sentences.en: I am tired of listening to his continual namedropping.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌听他的不断谈到要人的姓名以抬高身价.

sentences.en: I am tired of this continual rain.
I've had enough of their continual chatter.
sentences.cn: 我已厌烦了他们喋喋不休的闲谈.

sentences.en: It is continual that he glanced at Simon.
She finds the continual confrontation very wearing.
sentences.cn: 她发现持续的对峙让人精疲力竭。

sentences.en: She has endured house arrest and continual harassment by the police
sentences.cn: 她被软禁起来，并且遭到警方的频繁骚扰。
她不断受到警方的骚扰。

sentences.en: That sort of thing is quite continual.
The child's continual crying drove me to distraction.
sentences.cn: 那孩子不断的哭声弄得我几乎要发疯.

sentences.en: the Japanese business philosophy of continual improvement
sentences.cn: 日本人精益求精的经营哲学

sentences.en: The school has been in continual use since 1883.
sentences.cn: 自1883年以来，该校从未停办过。

sentences.en: They felt continual pressure to perform well.
sentences.cn: 他们不断感受到压力，促使他们好好表演。
